snippet.title: Zombie Farm 2  - iPhone & iPad Gameplay Video
snippet.description:
Zombie Farm 2

http://itunes.apple.com/app/zombie-farm-2/id494655448?mt=8

Category: "Games", "Simulation", "Role Playing", "Entertainment"

****************************************************************************

Appstore Description:

◉‿◉ Tired of killing zombies? Try farming them!

Play the #1 farm game in the App Store!

💀 FARM - grow and harvest your very own zombies
💀 CHOOSE - from a wide variety of crops and zombies. 100% organic!
💀 INVADE --fight zombie prejudice by unleashing your home grown zombies on the enemy!
💀 CUSTOMIZE -- unleash your inner or outer designer with the large array of decorations to jazz up your farm
💀 PLAY -- play tag with your friends on their farms & check out what your friends are doing with their farms
💀 CREATE -- experiment and mutate different plants and zombies to create a one of a kind zombie team!

JOIN THE COMMUNITY
Find out more at zombiefarmgame.com

GET SUPPORT
Contact us for help at http://theplayforge.zendesk.com

THE PLAYFORGE™
Makers of ZOMBIE FARM, the #1 zombie game on the App Store
Visit us at theplayforge.com
Twitter twitter.com/theplayforge
